definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
to bow and give way (idiom)/to surrender sth readily

sentences.english: Re throwing away happiness with both hands. And reaching out for something that will never make you.
sentences.chinese: 你把自己的幸福拱手相讓，去追求一些根本不會。

sentences.english: The hand responds to the heart, the pettifoggery is expressive, is in the folk art essence.
sentences.chinese: 心手相應，刀筆傳神，爲民間藝術中的精華。

sentences.english: I can look at your palm.
I have ceded youth, and is willing to accompany you to the old.
sentences.chinese: 我早已將青春拱手相讓，願陪你到老。

sentences.english: Some people still made a living by reading others'palms.
sentences.chinese: 有些人還是以幫人看手相爲生。

sentences.english: Sangmyung suddenly asked finally see JiShi palm divination again.
sentences.chinese: 祥明突然要求最後看季實子的手相再占卜一次。

sentences.english: Palmistry claims to know one's future by examining the lines on the palm of one's hand.
sentences.chinese: 看手相的通過觀看手掌的形狀和紋路爲人卜卦。

sentences.english: This feels like a palm reading, but the doctor' s description is accurate.
sentences.chinese: 這聽起來好像是在看手相，但大夫的診斷是正確的。

sentences.english: Learn how to read a person just by looking at their hand using the ancient art of palmistry.
sentences.chinese: 只要通過古老的手相術就可以知道怎麼看一個人。

sentences.english: You're throwing away happiness with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 你把自己的幸福拱手相讓。

sentences.english: A palmist also looks at the shape of the fingertips and nails.
sentences.chinese: 手相師也看指尖和指甲的形狀。

sentences.english: Heart by heart, hand in hand, forever friendship.
Janice: Are you sure? I've read a lot about palmistry.
sentences.chinese: 你真的不信？我讀過很多關於手相術的書。

sentences.english: When reading palms, you first look at the shape of the hand and then the lines.
sentences.chinese: 看手相的時刻要先看手型，然後纔看線紋。

sentences.english: Handing her my relay position on a silver platter, that's what.
sentences.chinese: 把我的接力位置拱手相讓，就是這樣。

sentences.english: Two Do you believe in palmistry?

definition: the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
six close relatives, namely: father 父[fu4], mother 母[mu3], older brothers 兄[xiong1], younger brothers 弟[di4], wife 妻[qi1], male children 子[zi3]/one's kin
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
